text:
Superhuman - https://superhuman.com | Fullstack Engineer & iOS Lead Engineer | Founding Team | Full-time | San Francisco | ONSITE

==Superhuman==

• What: Rebuilding the email experience. Think vim/sublime for email, for web & mobile: lightning fast, beautiful, and programmable

• Why: 900M+ people spend 1/3 of their day in email, they deserve superpowers that make them brilliant

• Investors: $5.1M seed (led by First Round Capital)

==Team==

• My Co-founder & CEO Rahul founded Rapportive (YC'10, acquired by LinkedIn)

• My Co-founder Vivek founded Rapleaf/LiveRamp (acquired for $310M)

• I previously was VP Eng at Bugsnag, and built pry (used by 25% of Ruby developers)

==Stack==

• Fullstack: Javascript, React, Webpack, HTML5, ServiceWorkers, IndexedDb, WebSQL, Golang, Postgres, Redis, Docker, Kubernetes

• iOS Lead: iOS Development, Swift, APIs

==Contact==

Email me: conrad@superhuman.com

– Conrad Irwin, Co-Founder & CTO
